channel.title: I just installed ubuntu
channel.description:
I just installed ubuntu And when i try to open Firefox it opens and shows Firefox on the Menu bar but then it closes
i reinstalled and re downloaded but it keeps doing the same thing
Can you help me please?
EDIT: I've fixed it turns out the flash drive i put it on still had the other installations on there and things where fucked up
